ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle cola-flavored carbonated beverage, or as needed.
des: "A combination of coffee and cola is delicious. You can also add whipped cream and dust it with cardamom on top. Add rum, rye whiskey, or brandy to make a cocktail."
ins: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add instant coffee granules. Slowly pour cola into the glass. Gently stir half-and-half into the cola to integrate.
